com.mapzen.android.graphics

Class OverlayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.graphics.OverlayManager

  • public class OverlayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Adds functionality to MapController map by way of LostApiClient.

      • drawSearchResult

        public void drawSearchResult(LngLat point,
                             boolean active)
        Draws a search result on the map at the point supplied.

      • drawSearchResult

        public void drawSearchResult(LngLat point,
                             boolean active,
                             int index)
        Draws a search result at the point supplied and displays it as active/inactive. If an index is supplied, it adds property PROP_SEARCH_INDEX when adding it to the map.

      • drawSearchResult

        public void drawSearchResult(LngLat point,
                             boolean active,
                             int index,
                             boolean persistMapData)
        Draws a search result at the point supplied and displays it as active/inactive. If an index is supplied, it adds property PROP_SEARCH_INDEX when adding it to the map. Optionally persists the map data to the MapDataManager.

      • clearSearchResult

        public void clearSearchResult()
        Clears search result from the map.

      • drawTransitRouteLine

        public void drawTransitRouteLine(java.util.List<LngLat> points,
                                 java.util.List<LngLat> stations,
                                 java.lang.String colorHex)
        Draws route line on the map for the points supplied. Also draws station icons for each point.

      • drawTransitRouteLine

        public void drawTransitRouteLine(java.util.List<LngLat> points,
                                 java.util.List<LngLat> stations,
                                 java.lang.String colorHex,
                                 boolean persistMapData)
        Draws route line on the map for the points supplied. Also draws station icons for each point. Optionally persists the map data to the MapDataManager.

      • clearTransitRouteLine

        public void clearTransitRouteLine()
        Clears transit route line from the map.

      • setPersistMapData

        public void setPersistMapData(boolean persistOnRecreation)
        By default all MapData objects are removed from the map when it is destroyed. To persist this data such as in the case of orientation changes, use this method.
        Parameters:
        persistOnRecreation - persist MapData across orientation changes

      • restoreMapData

        public void restoreMapData()
        Restores any MapData objects that were previously displayed on the map.
